member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.Widget.AllowedSizes
member.summary: Refers to the allowed sizes for the widget. This gets populated when user wants to configure the widget

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.Widget.ArtifactId
member.summary: Refers to unique identifier of a feature artifact. Used for pinning+unpinning a specific artifact.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.Widget.Dashboard
member.summary: Optional partial dashboard content, to support exchanging dashboard-level version ETag for widget-level APIs

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.Widget.metaData
member.summary: The entire metadata payload does not need to serialized and provided as part of the widget contract We expose only whats needed with explicit data members. This provides a slight performance improvement as the metadata payload is bulky.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.Widget.ContributionId
member.summary: The id of the underlying contribution defining the supplied Widget Configuration.

member.summary: For V1, this is just a pool of definitions describing our possible Widget Configurations.

members.member: Dev-facing id of this kind of widget configuration. [DataMember]

member.summary: The id of the underlying contribution defining the supplied Widget Configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetConfigurationMetadata.Targets
member.summary: Contribution target IDs

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata
member.summary: For V1, this is just a pool of definitions describing our possible Widgets.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.TypeId
member.summary: Dev-facing id of this kind of widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.PublisherName
member.summary: Publisher Name of this kind of widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.Targets
member.summary: Contribution target IDs

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.Name
member.summary: User facing name of the widget type. Each widget must use a unique value here.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.CatalogIconUrl
member.summary: Resource for an icon in the widget catalog.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.LoadingImageUrl
member.summary: Resource for a loading placeholder image on dashboard

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.Description
member.summary: Summary information describing the widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.IsVisibleFromCatalog
member.summary:
Opt-out boolean indicating if the widget is hidden from the catalog.
For V1, only "pull" model widgets can be provided from the catalog.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.IsEnabled
member.summary:
Widgets can be disabled by the app store.
We'll need to gracefully handle for: - persistence (Allow) - Requests (Tag as disabled, and provide context)

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.ContentUri
member.summary: Uri for the WidgetFactory to get the widget

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.AllowedSizes
member.summary: Sizes supported by the Widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.ConfigurationContributionId
member.summary: The id of the underlying contribution defining the supplied Widget custom configuration UI. Null if custom configuration UI is not available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.ConfigurationContributionRelativeId
member.summary: The relative id of the underlying contribution defining the supplied Widget custom configuration UI. Null if custom configuration UI is not available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.ConfigurationRequired
member.summary: Indicates if the widget requires configuration before being added to dashboard.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.DefaultSettings
member.summary: Optional default settings to be copied into widget settings

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.SupportedScopes
member.summary: Data contract required for the widget to function and to work in its container.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.ContributionId
member.summary: The id of the underlying contribution defining the supplied Widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.IsNameConfigurable
member.summary: Opt-out boolean that indicates if the widget supports widget name/title configuration. Widgets ignoring the name should set it to false in the manifest.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.CatalogInfoUrl
member.summary: Opt-in URL string pointing at widget information. Defaults to extension marketplace URL if omitted

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.LightboxOptions
member.summary: Opt-in lightbox properties

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.AnalyticsServiceRequired
member.summary: Opt-in boolean that indicates if the widget requires the Analytics Service to function. Widgets requiring the analytics service are hidden from the catalog if the Analytics Service is not available.
member.remarks: Even if a widget specifies an invalid size we don't consider it invalid as long as it has at least one valid size.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetMetadata.CreateDisabledInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Produces a canonical "Disabled" Metadata entry.

member.summary: Width of desired lightbox, in pixels

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.LightboxOptions.Height
member.summary: Height of desired lightbox, in pixels

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.LightboxOptions.Resizable
member.summary: True to allow lightbox resizing, false to disallow lightbox resizing, defaults to false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Dashboards.WebApi.WidgetsVersionedList
member.summary: Wrapper class to support HTTP header generation using CreateResponse, ClientHeaderParameter and ClientResponseType in WidgetV2Controller
